text: 3.16: 1 Ko 14.26; Ef 5.19; Kor 4.63.16: Ef 5.19-20Nde fhura Krais buna vhuueŋ ganɨrim, ne khaŋ tɨgɨp nde ndavi vherir ŋgarɨri. Nde bevbevira, nde guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, nde mbe phorgɨ suaŋv, ndɨkndɨgi vhuuin mbe khɨvɨrim, mbe tɨvir vhuuiŋra muuŋri. Nde Fhe Bakɨmen ndikndigɨp wari won ndavi vherir ana phorgɨp suaŋv, ana gavar ŋgavi ki nde ntan muuŋv, nde Fhe Bakɨme rotu mbui ŋgavir muuŋv, Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar nde ndavi khavim, nde ana rotu mbui ŋgavi, nde ntan muuŋri.
